field_speakers.processed: Lydia H. Liu, David Xu Borgonjon (Columbia University), Harlan Chambers (Columbia University), Li Chen (University of Toronto), Tamara Chin (Brown University), Anatoly Detwyler (University of Wisconsin-Madison), Gal Gvili (McGill University), Ari Heinrich (Australian National University), Michael Gibbs Hill (William & Mary), Andrew F. Jones (University of California, Berkeley), Jing Jiang (Reed College), Benjamin Kindler (Columbia University), Liansu Meng (University of Connecticut), Shaden Tageldin (University of Minnesota), Yurou Zhong (University of Toronto)

field_description.processed: Description: Please join us in celebrating Professor Lydia H. Liu's Translingual Practice in its 25th year on Friday, Dec. 18th, from 2:00 to 5:30PM EST, via Zoom. Speakers include: David Xu Borgonjon (Columbia University), Harlan Chambers (Columbia University), Li Chen (University of Toronto), Tamara Chin (Brown University), Anatoly Detwyler (University of Wisconsin-Madison), Gal Gvili (McGill University), Ari Heinrich (Australian National University), Michael Gibbs Hill (William & Mary), Andrew F. Jones (University of California, Berkeley), Jing Jiang (Reed College), Benjamin Kindler (Columbia University), Liansu Meng (University of Connecticut), Shaden Tageldin (University of Minnesota), Yurou Zhong (University of Toronto), followed by an address by Lydia H. Liu.
